Chosen Player gains 2 Diplomatic Victory points.
Duplicates of the chosen Luxury resource grant [ICON_Amenities] Amenities.
[ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes sent to the chosen player provide +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold to the sender. The chosen player receives +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity.
+10 Strength (Combat and Religious) for all units of this [ICON_Religion] Religion.
+{1_Amount} from World Religion
[WIP] Converting the chosen Power resource is twice as effective.
Producing, or purchasing military units using the chosen currency type, is +100% of the cost until the next World Congress.
Producing, or purchasing military units using the chosen currency type, is -50% of the cost until the next World Congress.
Chosen Player loses 2 Diplomatic Victory points.
The chosen Luxury resource grants no [ICON_Amenities] Amenities.
Cancels any international [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes between other civilizations and the chosen player, and embargoes any new ones from starting.
All players may condemn units of the chosen Religion, and doing so grants 25 [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor.
[WIP] Converting the chosen Power resource is half as effective.
[WIP] Chosen promotion class has -5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.
All players have their Weapons of Mass Destruction set equal to the target player's.
The target player loses all of their Weapons of Mass Destruction.
[WIP] The target player's cities are 100% Loyal.
[WIP] The target player cannot exert Loyalty pressure on others' cities.
[ICON_Tourism] Tourism from Great Works of this type is doubled.
No [ICON_Tourism] Tourism from Great Works of this type.
Gain [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor each turn this Policy is active in your Government.
Ban the use of this Policy.
This Government type gains a Wildcard policy slot.
This Government type loses a Wildcard policy slot.
+100% [ICON_Production] Production towards buildings in this district.
No buildings can be created in this district.
This player's borders will not grow via [ICON_Culture] Culture.
New districts built by this player act as [ICON_Culture] Culture bombs.
+100% [ICON_Production] Production towards this Project.
-50% [ICON_Production] Production towards this Project.
Earn double points towards [ICON_GreatPerson] Great People of this class.
No points earned towards [ICON_GreatPerson] Great People of this class.
Double [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor earned from being Suzerain of a City-State of this type.
Ban the production of buildings of this type.
50% discount on the production of buildings of this type.
No [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor earned from being Suzerain of a City-State of this type.
+100% of the City-States' yield type when sending [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to a City-State of this type.
City-States of this type do not provide their unique Suzerain bonus.
Appointing and promoting the specified [ICON_Governor] Governor type yields 15 [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor.
All active [ICON_Governor] Governors of the specified type are neutralized for 6 Turns.
+20% faster [ICON_Citizen] Population growth but -5 Loyalty per turn in this player's cities.
+5 Loyalty per turn but -20% [ICON_Citizen] Population growth in this player's cities.
Prohibits chopping or clearing Features of the chosen type.
Clearing Features of the chosen type yields [ICON_Gold] Gold equal to the [ICON_Production] Production and [ICON_Food] Food.
The chosen player generates 100% more [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances, and other players generate 100% more [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances toward this player.
The chosen player generates 50% fewer [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances, and other players generate 50% fewer [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances toward this player.
Spies executing the chosen Operation function 2 levels higher.
The chosen Operation is unavailable.
Units of the chosen promotion class gain +5 Combat Strength.
Units of the chosen promotion class lose 5 Combat Strength.

Production of units has been banned by a mandate of the World Congress.
Purchasing of units with [ICON_Gold] Gold has been banned by a mandate of the World Congress.
Purchasing of units with [ICON_Faith] Faith has been banned by a mandate of the World Congress.

You may vote for or against this Discussion.
You may not vote in favor of this Discussion. You are the target player.
You may not vote against this Discussion. You are the target player.
You may not vote on this Discussion. You have not met the target player.
You may not vote on this Discussion. You are not party to the Emergency.

A Special Session of the World Congress cannot be called so soon after one just finished.
